src:
Na ministrstvu za delo prejeli bel prah
04 Nov 2019, 10:44 by STA

Na ministrstvu za delo, družino, socialne zadeve in enake možnosti s sedežem za Bežigradom so danes zjutraj prejeli kuverto, iz katere se je vsul bel prah. Ta je po rezultatih prve analize nenevaren, so sporočili s Policijske uprave Ljubljana. Policisti nadaljujejo z zbiranjem obvestil o dogodku.



Fotografija je simbolična. Foto: STA

LJUBLJANA > Pošiljko, iz katere se je usul bel prah, so odprli okoli 8.30. Osebe, ki so bile v stiku s snovjo, so za nujno potreben čas izolirali od okolice. Kraj dogodka so zavarovali policisti, gasilci in delavci veterinarske fakultete ter izvedli ukrepe, ki so v teh primerih predvideni.
Rezultati prve analize, ki so jo opravili na inštitutu za mikrobiologio in parazitologijo ljubljanske veterinarske fakultete, so pokazali, da ne gre za nevarno snov, so sporočili s policije.
text:
Received white powder at the Ministry of Labor
04 Nov 2019, 10:44 by STA

The Ministry of Labor, Family, Social Affairs and Equal Opportunities, based in Bežigrad, received an envelope this morning from which white dust had been poured. This is dangerous according to the results of the first analysis, the Ljubljana Police Directorate said. Police officers continue to collect event notices.



Photography is symbolic. Photo: STA

LJUBLJANA> The consignment from which the white dust had poured in was opened around 8.30am. Persons in contact with the substance were isolated from the environment for an urgent time. The venue was secured by police officers, firefighters and veterinary staff, and the measures envisaged in these cases were implemented.
The results of the first analysis, carried out at the Institute of Microbiology and Parasitology at the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine in Ljubljana, showed that it was not a dangerous substance, police said.
